past_visits.feedback: Loved the spa and swimming! The yoga session was refreshing, and the cooking class was well organized. City tour was informative but a bit rushed. Room service was slow though.
Great gym and pool. Loved the wine tasting event. Live music in the evening added a nice touch. However, spa services were limited and faced water issues in the bathroom.
So peaceful! Loved the yoga and meditation sessions. Painting class was a surprise delight. The nature walk was calming. Only issue: late check-in process took too long.
Swimming pool was fantastic! Trekking trail was well marked, and the scuba diving was a unique experience. The photography tour helped me capture some amazing shots.
Relaxing spa and clean gym. The cultural show was vibrant and well-organized. Enjoyed golf and the wine tasting. Room was slightly smaller than expected.
Loved learning new recipes! Spa was luxurious. Yoga in the morning was energizing. The city tour guide was knowledgeable. Bicycles were available for local exploration.
Yoga was great and pottery workshop was fun. Dance class had energetic instructors. Gym was crowded and music in the lounge was too loud at times.
Clean and relaxing pool. Spa was decent. Enjoyed the evening live music with cocktails. Indoor games like table tennis kept me engaged during free hours. Overall great ambiance.
